dcterms:description: CASME II is a dataset of spontaneous micro-expressions collected in a well-controlled lab environment. It contains 247 micro-expressions from 35 subjects, labeled based on Action Units (AUs), self-reports, and the content of the stimuli video. The dataset includes 7 classes with varying sample sizes, highlighting class imbalance.
dcterms:title: CASME II
